title: The Diesel engine
brief_description: Old and new type fire syringe illustrates principles of compression, ignition and expansion. How it applies to the diesel engine. Operation and component parts of four-stroke cycle, double acting and opposed piston engines. Working of fuel injection systems.
description: Old and new type fire syringe illustrates principles of compression, ignition and expansion. How it applies to the diesel engine. Operation and component parts of four-stroke cycle, double acting and opposed piston engines. Working of fuel injection systems.
